entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to run unit tests with corerun? #108768
  • SortedDictionary<BigInteger, MyObject> System.AccessViolationException #108763
  • OpenAPI hangs on XElement #108755
    9.0.0
  • iOS UI Culture for Localisation #108753
  • [Apple][x64] EndsWithNoMatch_StringComparison test failure #108747
  • [System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext] Add a method to load specific assembly attributes #108746
  • 我应该如何正确的使用 IIncrementalGenerator #108744
  • ILC crash in CI - NullReferenceException in XPath while processing substitution XML #108743
  • Memory leak in HttpClient #108741
  • [API Proposal]: System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling.DelegateMarshaller for delegate #108738
    10.0.0
  • iOS "dotnet" exited with code 150. (MSB6006) #108735
  • [API Proposal]: Add Span<byte> support to System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData #108734
    10.0.0

Closed

  • osx/arm64: Assertion failed 'genExactlyOneBit(availableSet)' during 'Generate code' #108609
    10.0.0
  • Port System.Numerics docs for .NET 9 APIs #105981
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions in IndexOf #108669
    10.0.0
  • osx/arm64: Assertion failed 'emitJumpCrossHotColdBoundary(srcOffs, dstOffs) == false' during 'Emit code' #108611
    10.0.0
  • The Output of DateTime.ToString() is different in MacOs 14 from other platforms #108742
  • Test failure: JIT/jit64/mcc/interop/mcc_i61/mcc_i61.cmd #108638
    9.0.0
  • ARM - Snap Dragon X ELITE - The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.S dk' specified could not be found suddenly since this morning #108749
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for DuplicatePropertyNameHandling to System.Text.Json #88536
    Future
  • application load .net com component crash #106676
  • Guarded devirtualization generates checks that are never true #108471
    10.0.0
  • Add implementation for SetTcpKeepAlive in ServicePoint #24500
  • Unhandled exception. System.EntryPointNotFoundException: Unable to find an entry point named 'CryptoNative_SslCtxRemoveSession' in shared library 'libSystem.Security.Cryptography.Native.OpenSsl' #107472

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove BrotliUtils.MaxInputSize #108769
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Disable codeql on official builds part 2 #108767
    needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0] Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense to 20241010.1 #108765 #108766
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked, 9.0.0
  • Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense to 20241010.1 #108765
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked
  • Update the JSON schema exporter to reuse schemas more aggressively. #108764
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Test CI for Managed Mach Signing #108756
    area-HostModel
  • JIT: Refine assert for RMW check in crc32 codegen #108750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Use binary search in `FlowGraphNaturalLoops::GetLoopByHeader` #108739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Don't call EnsureInstanceActive under StaticBoxInitLock #108736
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Ensure to use float reserved register for TYP_SIMD12 #108629
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix minor markdown formatting errors/inconsistencies #108508
    documentation, area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Add DefaultMemberAttribute to Test.CoreLib #108258
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add missing return value doc comments for Create(ROS<float> values) #108645
    area-System.Numerics, 10.0.0
  • [Ppc64le] binaryformatter and tensors tests fix #108120
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • [release/9.0] Backport "JIT: Run single EH region repair pass after layout" #108715
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Move hot/cold splitting phase to backend #108639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Fix alloca builder creation #108654
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Fixes for issue #108519 #108650
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [mini] Don't use Unwind Backtrace on android-amd64 #108294
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Packaging: Port fix for GetParts from .NETFramework #108681
    area-System.IO
  • Update runtimelab pipeline #108754
    area-Meta
  • [release/9.0] Update `field` references in property accessors #108222
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Avoid backing field for marshallers. #108737
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 10.0.0
  • Doc updates #108722
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Tweak Invariant IndexOf logic #108729
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Tweak Invariant IndexOf logic #108728
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add loop-aware RPO, and use as LSRA's block sequence #108086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable Comparer_get_Default test on linux-arm64-crossgen #108725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • System.Net Stress Tests Improvements 2 #108703
    area-System.Net
  • Remove string.Trim{,Start,End}(ReadOnlySpan<char>) #108537
    area-System.Runtime, blocking-release, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Keep delegate object alive during invoke #105099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: run a late pass of empty try/finally/fault removal #108003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete DomainAssembly #108618
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Use TYP_SIMD8 for AddAcross #108727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [cdac] ExecutionManager contract and RangeSectionMap lookup unit tests #108685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Automatically synthesize ilproj assembly names for tests #108730
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [browser] Make boot json file name configurable #108708
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108434
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix TRACE_GC build #108089
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix GC stress log and analysis #108655
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Disable linux-x64 dev-innerloop #108581
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fixes deadlock for IncrementingPollingCounter callbacks #108648
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.11
  • Remove support for emitting and loading Itanium-64 assemblies #108084
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] stop using mmap/munmap #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Delete UsePublishedCrossgen2 property #108693
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [8.0] Guard against empty Accept address #108334
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • add support for parallel Connect #106374
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [main] guard agains empty Accept address #108616
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MonoVM] Improve thread state debugging and make it usable on Android #108401
    os-android, area-VM-threading-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Stop testing with V8 and `wasmconsole` #108711
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Use llvm 19.1.0 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete STUBLINKER_GENERATES_UNWIND_INFO #108684
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for Options_RespectRequiredConstructorParameters_FeatureSwitch test #108702
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable ApplyUpdateTest #108724
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2556893 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
